name: Point of View
storyline:
The story centers on Jane, a beautiful but reclusive artist with a dark traumatic secret who develops a voyeuristic obsession with Frank, her neighbor across the street. She also becomes curious in a relationship her friend Mary is carrying through the personal ads in the local newspaper with a mysterious man called 'P'. All their lives become entwined in a complex storyline that develops as we learn more about the characters and the things hidden in their pasts.

Point of View is a feature-length, interactive movie divided in twelve chapters. Each chapter ends in a series of questions probing your interpretations of the events you've witnessed, with your impressions shaping the course and outcome of the movie. There are no puzzles, there is no inventory, only your point of view.
